nodes.text: The Craci system was a system located within the boundaries of the Corporate Sector, at the intersection of the Intra-Sector Spur and the Authority Guardian Corridor. It had five worlds, all populous, that were focused on agricultural and industrial pursuits. It was one of the busiest ports and trade hubs in the Corporate Sector.

All five worlds of the system possessed populations of Cracian thumpers, which were long used by the native Cracians as beasts of burden; they proved to be indispensable mounts and pack beasts when exported to the galaxy at large.
